lineup.title: Lineup
lineup.subtitle: Sweet Edition 2026
lineup.coming_soon_description: Lineup coming soon... follow us so you don't miss a thing!
lineup.follow_cta: Follow us on Instagram to discover the first artists
lineup.revealing_description: New artists coming soon... stay tuned!

tickets.title: Tickets
tickets.subtitle: Sweet Edition 2026
tickets.description: Choose your ticket for Pablo The Garden's Sweet Edition!
tickets.comparison_description: Don't miss out: the earlier you buy, the less you pay!
tickets.practical_drink_card_description: The drink card is included with your ticket and lets you purchase drinks at the festival bars. It can be topped up during the event.
tickets.practical_age_description: Entry is allowed for those aged 16 and over. Minors (16-17 years old) must be accompanied by an adult or present a signed parental authorization.
tickets.practical_wristband_description: Present your ticket and a valid ID at the entrance to receive your wristband. Do not remove it for the entire duration of the festival!

experience.title: The Experience
experience.subtitle: Not just music, a complete experience

music.title: Music
music.description: National and international DJ sets, from sunset to sunrise. Techno, house, melodic and much more under the stars of Morrovalle.

food.title: Food & Drink
food.description: Selected street food, cocktail bars and our drink card for a carefree evening. Sweet taste guaranteed!

fun_zone.title: Fun Zone
fun_zone.description: Inflatables, games and Instagrammable candy-themed corners. Guaranteed fun between sets!

scenography.title: Scenography
scenography.description: Immersive installations, lights and Sweet Edition themed decorations. The garden transforms into a world of sweetness.

editions.title: The Editions
editions.subtitle: A journey through our themed editions

edition_2023.name: Parrot Edition
edition_2023.description: The first edition! Pablo the parrot started it all, with tropical colors and rhythms that made Morrovalle dance for the first time.

edition_2024.name: Jungle Edition
edition_2024.description: Pablo migrates to the jungle: wild scenography, tribal rhythms and unstoppable energy. The garden transformed into a dancing forest.

edition_2025.name: Flower Edition
edition_2025.description: The garden blooms: petals, pastel colors and dreamy atmospheres. Over 6,500 people danced among the flowers.

edition_2026.name: Sweet Edition
edition_2026.description: The sweetest edition ever! Candy, pastel colors and a world of sugar await you on August 15 and 16.

sponsors.title: Partners
sponsors.subtitle: Thanks to our partners
sponsors.become_partner_description: Want to associate your brand with Pablo The Garden? Contact us to discover partnership opportunities.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: The story of Pablo The Garden
about.team_description: A group of friends united by a passion for electronic music and the desire to create something special in Morrovalle.
about.mission_description: To promote electronic music as an art form, to enhance the local area and to create a community that shares the same passion.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Write to us for any information or collaboration proposals
contact.form_success: Thank you for writing to us! We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.form_error: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again or contact us directly via email.
contact.form_validation_email: Please enter a valid email address
contact.sponsor_cta_description: Want to associate your brand with Pablo The Garden? Get in touch and let's create something sweet together!

meta.home_title: Pablo The Garden — Sweet Edition 2026 | Electronic Music Festival
meta.home_description: Pablo The Garden — Sweet Edition: the electronic music festival in Morrovalle (MC). August 15–16, 2026. DJ sets, food trucks, fun zone and immersive candy-themed scenography.
meta.lineup_title: Lineup — Pablo The Garden Sweet Edition 2026
meta.lineup_description: Discover the full lineup of Pablo The Garden Sweet Edition 2026. National and international DJs await you in Morrovalle on August 15 and 16.
meta.tickets_title: Tickets — Pablo The Garden Sweet Edition 2026
meta.tickets_description: Buy tickets for Pablo The Garden Sweet Edition 2026. 2-day pass or single day ticket. Morrovalle (MC), August 15–16, 2026.
meta.gallery_description: Relive the best moments from past editions of Pablo The Garden: Parrot Edition 2023, Jungle Edition 2024, Flower Edition 2025.
meta.blog_description: News, announcements and updates about Pablo The Garden Sweet Edition 2026. Discover the lineup, ticket sale dates and much more.
meta.about_description: The story of Pablo The Garden: from a group of friends to one of the most beloved electronic music festivals in the Marche region. Discover our editions and team.
meta.rules_description: Entry rules and code of conduct for Pablo The Garden Sweet Edition 2026. Please read carefully before attending.
meta.contact_description: Contact the Pablo The Garden team for collaborations, partnerships, press inquiries or any questions about the festival.
